about_the_game:
Your Music Video is the Game! Step into the world of "Pixelgroove," where your favorite music videos are transformed into thrilling, action-packed shooter experiences. Each video you choose spawns a completely unique gaming adventure, brimming with energy and excitement.

Gameplay Powered by Your Video's Visuals:
"Pixelgroove" doesn't just play your video—it immerses you in it. Key visual elements, such as faces, human figures, and diverse objects, are intelligently detected and seamlessly integrated into the gameplay. These aren't just background elements; they evolve into unique power-ups, injecting a layer of strategic depth and surprise into every level.

The beat doesn't just set the mood—it shapes the action. The tempo and rhythm of your chosen music are intricately tied to the game mechanics, dictating the pace and pulse of each challenge. This ensures a gameplay experience that's not only engaging but also deeply personal and ever-changing.

An Unmatched Synthesis of Music and Gameplay:
In "x," your music videos aren't just a playlist—they're the very soul of the game. Our innovative engine meticulously crafts each level to reflect the unique rhythm and visual essence of your video, offering a gameplay experience that’s as varied as your music tastes.

Prepare to see your music videos in a whole new light, where every chorus brings a new challenge. With "Pixelgroove," your musical taste is the gateway to a gaming adventure that's as unpredictable as it is exhilarating.


Credits & Attributions:
This page incorporates footage/screenshots from the following Creative Commons Music Videos:

  • Title: NEFFEX - My Way 😤 (Official Music Video) [Copyright Free] No.158, Author: **NEFFEX** 
  • Title: Maía - Un Beso De Su Boca (Video Oficial), Author: MAIA MUSICAL
  • Title: 李毓芬Tia Lee《是我不夠好Not Good Enough》Official Music Video HD, Author: Passion Sisters【宏將多利安國際股份有限公司


Note: this game is open source and can be found on github.

name: Pixelgroove

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3 1125G4
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on "Pixelgroove," a one-of-a-kind shmup adventure where your chosen music video's visuals and beats transform into exhilarating gameplay. Each video's distinct imagery directly influences the game's dynamics, crafting an experience unique to every song.
